About.paragraph: At Inskape we bring together the functionality and aesthetics to provide homeowners with customized and efficient home designs. Our designers are specialised in home interior design and home décor and we work with a vision of creating your  dream personalised space suiting your lifestyle.From sophisticated living room designs to space-saving  and clutter-free interior designs, everything at a single destination … Inskape We are here to help you create your best personalised space matching your style and needs.Explore thousands of inspiring interior designs or get  a free estimate … it's all here at Inskape, your one destination for all home interiors.

Testimonials.text: "I absolutely loved the work. I would definitely recommend Inskape.The best part is that they clearly understood our requirements and budget, and provided the best possible home."
Testimonials.name: Kavin

Testimonials.text: "High quality products are used overall in the project. Feedbacks and concerns if any were solved immediately."
Testimonials.name: Kamalesh Govindaraj

Testimonials.text: "Inskape’s experience centre had a collection of creative designs and our search for a home interior firm ended here. We were happy with flawless execution and timely customer interaction"
Testimonials.name: Gowshigan

Testimonials.text: "Inskape has made our flat into a home, a home which we always wanted. They understood us and gave us our dream home. The journey with them has been an amazing and smooth one for sure."
Testimonials.name: Threshika

Testimonials.text: "Getting our house interior done by Inskape is one of the wonderful decision which we had taken. It was extremely thoughtful decision and I am pleased to admit that they didn’t disappoint a bit."
Testimonials.name: Bharath Vishwa

Testimonials.text: "It was really good to get my home interior done by Inskape and was really great to get it completed before 8 days of actual handover date...Good Job Guys...Really appreciate Kaviya and the team for their hard work and dedication."
Testimonials.name: Anu Venkat

Team.name: Michelle
Team.job: Technical Designer specialised in CAD Drafts
